site.title: EV0
site.description: 1EV0 is a free and open-source serverless blog template, built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

metadata.meta_description: 2EV0 is a free and open-source serverless blog template, built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

author.name: Welcome to Kusadasi
author.bio: Kusadasi boasts breathtaking coastal beauty, golden beaches, and a lively atmosphere. Steeped in history, it serves as a gateway to ancient wonders like the magnificent city of Ephesus, a significant historical site nearby.
